categories: Category:Missions of the Jedi Civil War

nodes.text: The Search for the Star Maps was an operation executed by Darth Revan and his student Darth Malak in their search of the Star Maps, which could lead them to the Rakatan Star Forge.

The Sith Lords visited the Rakatan ruins on Tatooine, the Hrakert Rift on Manaan, the Tomb of Naga Sadow on Korriban, the Builder Forge on Kashyyyk and the Rakatan ruins on Dantooine. The Sith finally acquired the location of the Star Forge in the Lehon system.

The Jedi stationed at the Jedi Enclave on Dantooine were unaware that Revan and Malak traveled to the Rakatan ruins nearby, and the mission remained unknown to the Jedi Order until an amnesiac Revan, being retrained in the ways of the Force, was sent to the Rakatan ruins as a Jedi trial.
